welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Upper Dublin, where history meets modern charm! Known for its beautiful parks and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines and Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Handles international flights for major airlines such as British Airways and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for low-cost carriers such as Southwest Airlines and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Corporate Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Upper Bucks Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
